General.Name: Hoist Finance AB
General.Description: Hoist Finance AB (publ), a credit market company, engages in the loan acquisition and management operations in Europe. It operates through Unsecured and Secured segment. The company purchases performing and non-performing loans from its partners, international banks, and financial institutions. It also offers debt restructuring solutions. In addition, it provides current and fixed-term deposit account. The company was formerly known as Hoist International AB (publ) and changed its name to Hoist Finance AB (publ) in January 2015. Hoist Finance AB (publ) was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden.

9.Name: Yngve  Ralph
9.Title: Head of Strategy & CEO of Projects
